        已过时。 
        create a stub pool to the [url] with [size] of stub please refers to create(url, poolSize, timeout).
        参数:
        url - the url
        poolSize - the pool size
        返回:
        the stub pool
        抛出:
        Exception - the exception

        public Stub get()
         throws IOException

        返回:

        抛出:
